original_title: Nový Hyperion aneb Volnost, rovnost, bratrství
overview: From the behavior, discourse, and appearance of individual actors, Vachek composes, in the form of a mosaic, a broad and many-layered film-argument about Czechoslovak democracy in the period of its rebirth, all administered with the director’s ini­mitable point of view.
title: New Hyperion or Liberty, Equality, Brotherhood
